text: Flowers Foods is a producer and marketer of packed bakery food. It is headquartered in Thomasville, Georgia. It operates 47 bakeries producing bread, buns, rolls, snack cakes, pastries, and tortillas. It is the second- largest baking company in the United States. It was founded in 1919. Category:American food companies Category:1919 establishments in the United States
title: Flowers Foods
